Blog.post: and today. No Palmer though, he's in Mexico.
Gotta keep the cups a flowing!
I've been a bit lax but I've been drinking the coffee. Just haven't had time to post. Coffee and donuts today. And a trip to the Eye doctor to get a piece of insulation out of my eye. Not fun.
...and coffee.
2 cups this morning and it's almost time for our meeting about teh scripts in the levels.
Long meetings need good coffee.
God bless the c3000.
Warm cup after a meal is great.
Had a couple of cups at home with Meg and Liam. I'm at work now and had to have a cup of C3000 joe. Mmm Mmmm.
Hot cuppa joe postlunch. Good stuff.
Mmmm Donuts....
Had sushi with Meghan, Liam, and our friend David. He's off to Phoenix to build the better buddhist. We'll miss him. But he'll be back in October to see the Pixies with us. Good luck buddy.
Tasty and black. Need to shoot a pic of the coffee for you.
urlLink the Cup urlLink
Finished just a few minutes ago. Time for lunch.
Need coffee....
These gray days, these rainy days, are perfect for a warm cup. Are these the summer rains yet or are we still in spring.
Love it! Warm coffee...tastes good.
More coffe and some guitar freaks this morning. Still can't get an A on the damn thing.

Had a great lunch with Krolczyk at India Palace. No coffee involved but some great conversation and even better Indian food. Love those buffets. When I went back to work I had the obligatory cup o' joe.
Another one. And some pop tarts cause they taste good. I don't even know why I'm so hungry this morning. Maybe it's one of those gray days things.

Had a cup a joe with Palmer. Then we played a quick couple of games of guitar freaks. I am so bad at this game. I'll never be a guitarist for sure. Still havn't gotten an A on "Cutie pie" Missed four so I'll have to do better next time.
Had a cup at home and starting on a new cup here at work.

Had a good time at John's last night for the "Night of Nights" celebration. Had a night time cup a joe. Good stuff. Sunday was filled with a number of cups. A cup in the morning pre-church. The Knights of Columbus had breakfast at church which I had coffee, pancake, and bacon. Another cup at home witht he paper. Then some night time coffee witht he Murphy's that night. The Murphys came by and we grilled tolopia (sp?), asparagus, and had crabcakes. We made banana cream ice cream in our new ice cream maker. We had it on a brownie and served coffee witht he desert.

Had a cup this morning. We use a french press at home by the way. And then took a cup in the travel mug and headed out to the airport with Meg and Liam to pick up Grandmother Suzie at 8am. Good times. At work now having another mid day cup. A working I go, working on the Pak 36 texture.
Thanks to Spalmer for sharing one of his wife's famous, nearly, all chocolate cookies. Tasty! Time for another cup of Joe!
urlLink This is the famous C3000. urlLink
Tasty and busy. Had to talk with a bunch of artists. Almost finished the cup talking to Jen, Eli, JerAmy, and Mikey. Maybe it's time for another.
Coffee and donuts! Getting ready for my second cup this morning...coffee....
Time for some more JOE!
Warm morning coffee...mmmm...and a chocolate cookie.

Last night was rainy and seriously thuderstorming. $100 million in losses in the Dallas area. But you know what cures all ills...a fine cup a Joe and a breakfast taco. Good stuff. Plus Coffee with Spalmer.
It's late and working at the office. Needed a little sippin coffee.
Time for a hot cuppa joe! Joined by Spalmer! 2nd cup today.
